name: Russell CARROLL v. WORKERS COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (UNIVERSITY OF PENNSYLVANIA). Petition of University of Pennsylvania
name_abbreviation: Carroll v. Workers Compensation Appeal Board

parties: Russell CARROLL v. WORKERS COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (UNIVERSITY OF PENNSYLVANIA). Petition of University of Pennsylvania.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of December 2000, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted and the matter is submitted on briefs.
The application for supersedeas is granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
764 A.2d 1053
Russell CARROLL v. WORKERS COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (UNIVERSITY OF PENNSYLVANIA). Petition of University of Pennsylvania.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 21, 2000.
